snippet.title: Gunkid 99 - Release trailer
snippet.description:
Gunkid 99 will be released on Steam, March 13th, 2019!

GUNKID 99 is a fast and frantic 2D arena-shooter that will seriously 
challenge your skills and reflexes. Craft your own unique play-style and develop crazy combos​ with numerous weapons and abilities at your disposal! Lay waste to endless hordes of enemies and get that top score on Steam's global Leaderboards!

Wishlist on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/906600/Gunkid_99/

First Access available now on Itch.io:
https://yongjustyong.itch.io/gunkid99

Join the community on Discord!
https://discord.gg/XCVew3K

You can also find me on:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/yongjustyong
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/gunkid_99/
Tumblr: https://yongjustyong.tumblr.com/

Music from the wonderful Ozzed: https://ozzed.net
